translated: The United States intends to achieve an economy-wide target of reducing its emissions by 26%-28% below its 2005 level in 2025 and to make best efforts to reduce its emissions by 28%. China intends to achieve the peaking of CO₂ emissions around 2030 and to make best efforts to peak early and intends to increase the share of non-fossil fuels in primary energy consumption to around 20% by 2030.

Et soudain il se joignit à l’ange une multitude de l’armée céleste, louant Dieu et disant : Gloire à Dieu dans les lieux très hauts, et paix sur la terre parmi les hommes qu’il agrée !
translated: And the angel said unto them, Fear not: for, behold, I bring you good tidings of great joy, which shall be to all people. For unto you is born this day in the city of David a Saviour, which is Christ the Lord. And this shall be a sign unto you; Ye shall find the babe wrapped in swaddling clothes, lying in a manger. And suddenly there was with the angel a multitude of the heavenly host praising God, and saying, Glory to God in the highest, and on earth peace, good will toward men.

translated: Your room is twice the size of mine.

original: Je n'arrive pas à croire que votre mère vous aie laissés partir.
translated: I can't believe your mom let you go.

original: J'ai trouvé une de mes chaussures sous mon lit, mais je ne trouve pas l'autre.
translated: I found one of my shoes under my bed, but I can't find the other one.

original: Ils habitent dans une autre maison.
translated: They are living in another house.

original: J'ai fait du riz.
translated: I made rice.

original: Réforme ou casse-toi !
translated: Shape up or ship out!

original: Les signes me semblent favorables.
translated: I see the signs well.

original: À Nara il y a beaucoup de cerfs !
translated: In Nara there are lots of deer!

original: Vous devriez déjà être rentrée chez vous.
translated: You should've gone home already.

original: Elle divorça après de longues années de tristesse.
translated: She divorced him after many years of unhappiness.

original: Je te verrai demain.
translated: See you tomorrow.

original: Elles avaient besoin d'argent.
translated: They needed money.

original: Je pense qu'il est nécessaire que vous le voyiez.
translated: I think you need to see him.

original: Tu n'as pas le droit de me donner des ordres.
translated: You have no right to give me orders.

original: Je suis trop content pour toi.
translated: I'm too happy for you.

original: Ce fruit n'est pas assez mûr pour être cueilli.
translated: This fruit isn't ripe enough to pick yet.

original: As-tu déjà raconté la nouvelle à ton ami ?
translated: Have you told your friend the news yet?

original: Garde les mains en l'air !
translated: Keep your hands up.

original: Il y a des gens qui pensent qu'ils ne peuvent écrire de roman parce qu'ils manquent du vocabulaire.
translated: There are some people who think that they can't write a novel because they lack the vocabulary.

original: Toutes les lumières s'éteignirent.
translated: All the lights went out.

original: Elle est coupable comme Tom.
translated: She is as guilty as Tom.

original: Inoue n'aime pas les ordinateurs.
translated: Inoue doesn't like computers.

original: Vais-je me faire crier dessus ?
translated: Am I going to get yelled at?

original: Je travaille comme maîtresse d'école.
translated: I work as a teacher.

original: Construisez une phrase à partir de cet ensemble de mots.
translated: Construct a sentence from this set of words.

original: J'attends sa réponse.
translated: I'm waiting for her response.

original: Tom semble être conscient de ce qui se passe.
translated: Tom seems to be aware of what's happening.

original: Le bateau arrive ce soir à San Francisco.
translated: The ship will arrive in San Francisco this evening.

original: Nager dans l'océan est mon plus grand plaisir.
translated: To swim in the ocean is my greatest pleasure.

original: Ce problème vaut le coup d'être discuté.
translated: This problem is worth discussing.

original: Je suis content d'avoir l'opportunité de travailler avec vous.
translated: I'm glad for this opportunity to work with you.

original: Vous n'êtes pas autorisés à nager ici.
translated: You're not allowed to swim here.

original: Tu n'as qu'à appuyer sur le bouton.
translated: You've only got to press the button.

original: Écris-lui.
translated: Write to her.

original: Ne me pointe pas du doigt !
translated: Don't point your finger at me.

original: Le champ de ma spécialité de recherche est la sociologie.
translated: The field of my research specialty is sociology.

original: Tu es mon père.
translated: You're my father.

original: La clarté du ciel indiquait que la tempête était passée.
translated: The brightness of the sky showed that the storm had passed.

original: Je pue.
translated: I stink.

original: J'adore le français.
translated: I love French.

original: Pouvez-vous me promettre que vous ne ferez pas cela ?
translated: Can you promise me you won't do that?

original: Veuillez procéder.
translated: Please proceed.

original: Si tu touches ce fil, tu recevras une décharge.
translated: If you touch that wire, you'll get a shock.

original: La statue de la Liberté se trouve à New York.
translated: The Statue of Liberty is found in New York.

original: Je ferai du thé.
translated: I'll make some tea.

original: Des représentants de nombreux pays ont participé à la conférence.
translated: Delegates from many countries participated in the conference.

original: Ces derniers temps, tout me semble chiant.
translated: Recently, everything seems boring to me.

original: Tu fais trop la nouba.
translated: You party too hard.

original: J'ai oublié de vous envoyer un courriel.
translated: I forgot to send you an e-mail.

original: Faites le bien à ceux qui vous haïssent.
translated: Do good to those who hate you.

original: Je nourris mon chien deux fois par jour.
translated: I feed my dog twice a day.

original: Nous ne nous soumettrons pas à un tyran.
translated: We will not bend to the will of a tyrant.

original: Joaquín est argentin.
translated: Joaquin is an argentinian.

original: On te tuera !
translated: You’ll be killed!

original: Chaque fois qu'ils parlent, ils se disputent.
translated: Every time they talk, they argue.

original: Tom a oublié de dire merci.
translated: Tom forgot to say thank you.

original: Le repas est prêt.
translated: Lunch is ready.

original: Les deux frères sont d'apparence plutôt dissemblable.
translated: The two brothers are quite unlike in their appearance.

original: On dirait que quelque chose ne va pas.
translated: It seems to me that something's wrong.

original: Cela ne peut pas durer.
translated: That can't last.

original: Tom est l'homme du moment.
translated: Tom is the man of the hour.
